constraints.name: bed_exact_size_2x2m
constraints.description: Verifies that a bed object (double_bed, single_bed, or kids_bed) exists with dimensions exactly 2m × 2m in the XZ plane (horizontal dimensions). The bed's size along X-axis and Z-axis should both be 2.0 meters (±0.05m tolerance for numerical precision).

constraints.name: bed_presence_required
constraints.description: Ensures that at least one bed object (double_bed, single_bed, or kids_bed) is present in the bedroom scene and is not marked as empty.
